name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-botpowered-basicace-collect-feedback
title: Bot-Powered-ACE Collect Feedback
shortDescription: Viva Connection Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) that shows how to collect feedback from users using a Bot-Powered-ACE implemented with .NET.
longDescription: Viva Connection Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) that shows how to collect feedback from users using a Bot-Powered-ACE implemented with .NET.
